title: Other Sub-Arterial roads, Collector streets, local streets, etc
clause_text: Other Sub-Arterial roads, Collector streets, local streets, etc. shall be proposed as per the requirements to cater to the need of occupancies on such roads including for pedestrians.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Other Sub-Arterial roads, Collector streets, local streets, etc. shall be proposed as per the requirements to cater to the need of occupancies on such roads including for pedestrians.
